author: Sam-Harper
body:
#### PR description:

In PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/32754, the output of directDependences was changed such that it was grouped by type (ie module, sequence). 

It is useful for my code that I get the order they occur on the sequence. Therefore I propose the simplest solution of adding an option to the function such that this old behaviour can be supported. 



#### PR validation:

directDependences output is unchanged by default. The previous ordering is recovered when the bool is set false.
title: adding option to preserve the order of the direct dependences : 120X
